articles.title: A trio of images highlight BepiColombo's third Mercury flyby - European Space Agency
articles.description: The ESA/JAXA BepiColombo mission has made its third of six gravity assist flybys at Mercury, snapping images of a newly named impact crater as well as tectonic and volcanic curiosities as it adjusts its trajectory for entering Mercury orbit in 2025.
